text: The javelin throw event at the 1922 Women's World Games took place in Paris at the Stade Pershing on 20 August 1922. The qualification took place during the morning session with the final taking place during the afternoon session. Swiss Francesca Pianzola won the event with a distance of 43.24 metre, ahead of the French Yvonne Gancel and American Lucile Godbold. It was the only medal Switzerland won at the 1922 Women's World Games. ==Results== ===Qualification=== The qualification took place during the morning session. The best four athletes qualified for the final. Rank Name Nationality Right Left Total distance Notes ? Yvonne Gancel Q ? Francesca Pianzola Q ? Lucile Godbold Q ? Q 5 Kathryn Agar 6 align=left ? title: 1922 Women's World Games – javelin throw
